channel.title: Uptime
channel.description:
Alright, basically we never shut off our server, and it also never crashed, however the uptime was 99% when I woke up YESTERDAY and is still 99%.
My question is that, why couldn't the bot connect, or what happened to my uptime. It's nothing on our side, we verified everything.
Thanks, if you could refresh the uptime to 100% as well that would be great.

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

There is nothing that any of the mods can do, nor anything that the admins will do to “reset” your uptime.

The bot checks every 30 minutes, and if it doesn’t get a response within the timeout period, it marks it as down until the next check.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Well, there might have been a connection packet error for a split second, when the mopar bot was checking for uptime, then it stayed “down” until the bot checked again.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @TremblayX TremblayX
item.description:
@TremblayX wrote:

Any other ideas as to what could of caused this?

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Connection packet error is my only other thought.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @TremblayX TremblayX
item.description:
@TremblayX wrote:

No, no connection problems, nothing disconnected. Also I’ve reached back to 100% before, it takes a while though. Do you think it’s possible to inform me on what happened to the uptime?

Any admins that could investigate the cause of uptime?

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I’m guessing you had a dip in internet connection? Just a guess. Also, their bot may have not recognized the outbound server connection.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

they won’t refresh it for you. it could be the connection between it connecting could be to slow.
99 > 100% will either never happen, or will take weeks/months (never tried it so i wouldn’t know).

Read full topic
